mapper.sql: DN, DN_Item, SO, SO_Item, Plant, Stor_Loc, Shipping_Point, DN_status, Delivery_Date, Qty, Unit
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from dn_info_sap
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into dn_info_sap (DN, DN_Item, SO, SO_Item, Plant, Stor_Loc, Shipping_Point, DN_status, Delivery_Date, Qty, Unit) values (#{dn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dnItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{so,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{soItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shippingPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dnStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deliveryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into dn_info_sap (DN, DN_Item, SO, SO_Item, Plant, Stor_Loc, Shipping_Point, DN_status, Delivery_Date, Qty, Unit) values
